title: Abilities won't cast when I press keys (Q/W/E/R)
body:
When I'm in game everything (tab, esc, etc) except the letter keys (q,w,e,r,etc) works correctly. However if I try to use an ability by pressing q. Nothing happens. (I've tried quick cast and normal cast)

I've tried reconnecting, using another keyboard, restoring default settings, and using different USB ports but none have permanently worked. After switching to a different keyboard it was fine for one game, then it didn't work for the second. Same thing for switching USB ports. Both keyboards work perfectly otherwise.

I did spam F once and after about 10 presses it cast. So I'm very confused.

EDIT: Also one of the keyboards has worked excellently for League of Legends for 3 years and still works perfectly well for playing other games. However it has the same issue.

My thoughts on the problem: The other keyboard is pretty new and these last couple of games have been my first time using it with League of Legends. Perhaps it's done something and that something is what's making the old keyboard have the same issue?

replies.body:
It sounds like your config may have become corrupt somehow.  Try performing a reset then test it out in a custom game to test.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know if that fixes the issue.
Thank you so much! It worked perfectly. Thank you for your terrific help.

I am having this same problem but it is random. Some games it does it other games it doesn't. I also have no idea where to find these things you are talking about so can you simplify your wording because I logged into league but couldn't figure out where to go to delete files

To help simplify, you can simply navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends and delete the config folder itself.  Be sure that you're still logged into the client, though.  Test it out in a few custom games to be sure it's fixed.
